verbs.description: [ARG1: husband wife] [V: found] [ARGM-PRD: dead] [ARGM-LOC: in basement] [ARGM-LOC: in murder - suicide] a man and woman were found dead in the basement of their florissant home sunday evening in a suspected murder - suicide according to officer steve michael a spokesman for the florissant police department police were dispatched to a home in the 1500 block of man o war drive fo florissant police department steve michael florissant missouri mahmoud abukanan linda abukanan valincia butller murder suicide jeffrey davis
